If is't doesn't work for you, read the txt. files :

1) Run the game exe.
2) Run the keygen, copy the serial from the keygen to the activation window. Keep the keygen running.
3) Click on "Manual Activation" and then click "Back".
4) Now click the "Generate" button in the keygen. Wait a bit.
5) Click on "Manual Activation" again and apply the generated Activation Code from the keygen to finish the activation process.

PS: If you do not follow these steps correctly, have attempted to register the game before for some reason, or for similar reasons
have a problem registering, use the registry editor (regedit.exe) to delete all keys and values under
HKEY_CURRENT_USERSoftwareFOCUSWarGame European EscalationKeys and then retry.

1. Unrar
2. Burn or mount the image
3. Install the game AS ADMINISTRATOR!!
4) Run the game exe.
5) Run the keygen ( from your desktop, don`t put it in the install directory !!), copy the serial from the keygen to the activation window. Keep the keygen running.

Do it this way and game will work!!

Enjoy!

I got it working, I know there aren't many posts that help that much, I was trying to install it for an hour, and failing, the steps do actually work, just try any of these things, they worked for me.

- When you go to use the keygen, actually put it on your desktop, don't leave it anywhere else.

- Make sure your antivirus isn't blocking anything related to the keygen, or the keygen itself

- If you have failed even once, make sure you use the regedit.exe (windows search if you can't find) to delete the license0, license1 etc.

- Make sure you put the crack in before you activate it otherwise it will send you to steam

Following the steps provided in the instructions, and following these tips got mine working.

Having issues?

OK, well, first, read mshrak's comment. Do that. Exactly that. I'll break it down even further...

1. UNRAR the ISO (image file). I know it sounds weird but do it.
2. Mount that ISO (or burn it).
3. Install as administrator.
4. Run the executable.
Follow the rest of his instructions to a T.

Specific errors:
1. You couldn't run the game to get to the registration because you're missing a file.
This is because you didn't UNRAR the ISO.

2. The keygen didn't work. This is because you did it wrong a couple of times. Go to:
HKEY_CURRENT_USERSoftwareFOCUSWarGame European EscalationKeys
Delete all the keys. Then retry.

In case no one's noticed. This already has the Battlefields DLC and Skirmish play. What this doesn't have is the newly released CONQUEST DLC. Which includes a new mode and map and some major patch changes.

After logging about 48 hours into this game, its really fun and I definitely will be buying it. So, if anyone's interested in buying this game, STEAM currently has a 50% OFF Offer for this weekend only. Also, all DLC currently for Wargame is free.

Ok, here is what you have to do.

1) Unrar
2) Run setup.exe and wait while the game installs.
3) Copy all the contents of crack into the installation folder
4) Run the game exe.
5) Run the keygen, copy the serial from the keygen to the activation window. Keep the keygen running.
6) Click on "Manual Activation" and then click "Back".
7) Now click the "Generate" button in the keygen. Wait a bit.
8) Click on "Manual Activation" again and apply the generated Activation Code from the keygen to finish the activation process.

It will not work if you try to ketgen before copying the files from the crack folder. If you try you have to: 
if you do not follow these steps correctly, have attempted to register the game before for some reason, or for similar reasons
have a problem registering, use the registry editor (regedit.exe) to delete all keys and values under
HKEY_CURRENT_USERSoftwareFOCUSWarGame European EscalationKeys and then retry.

If after doing so you are getting an error with the keygen saying that "Unable to read hardware information from registry" you have to go to the specified place posted above (regit, etc..) and delete the folder called "license 1", "license 2", etc...
